common.longPressHint: Riix dheer si aad ugu fududato gelitaanka

splash.title: NASAKA
splash.subtitle: IEBC
splash.description: Hel Xafiiska IEBC ee Ugu Dhow
splash.disclaimer: Ogolaansho goobta hel si aad u hesho xarunta diiwaangelinta IEBC ee ugu dhow oo aad u hesho hagitaan wareeg-waareeg ah.
splash.locationBlockedDescription: Fadlan khabiir goobta qeybinta browser-kaaga oo dib u soo celi

search.placeholder: Raadi xafiisyada IEBC ee degmada, deegaanka, ama goobta...
search.findAllMatching: Hel dhammaan xafiisyada IEBC ee u dhigma
search.noMatchQuery: Xafiis walba ma dhaco "{{query}}". Isku day raadi kale.
search.noOfficesInArea: Xafiis IEBC ah lama helin aaggaaga.

bottomSheet.locationAccessDesc: Khabiir helitaanka goobta si aad u aragto qiyaasta kharashka, hesho tilmaamaha goobtaada hadda, oo aad u hesho wadada ugu dhow xafiiskan.
bottomSheet.contributeLocation: Ka Qayb Qaad Goobta La Illoobay
bottomSheet.confirmOffice: Bulshadu waxay xaqiijin kartaa xafiiskan inuu jiro
bottomSheet.within500m: Waa inaad xafiiska ka joogtaa 500m gudahiisa
bottomSheet.distanceAway: Waxaad ka fog tahay {{distance}}m. Fadlan u dhaqaaq {{maxDistance}}m xafiiska gudahiisa si aad u xaqiijiso.
bottomSheet.confirmationFailed: Khalad ayaa dhacay xaqiijinta. Fadlan isku day mar kale.
bottomSheet.locationPermissionRequired: Ogolaansho goobta ayaa loo baahan yahay xaqiijinta. Fadlan khabiir helitaanka goobta oo isku day mar kale.
bottomSheet.tapForGoogleMaps: Taabo xafiiska si aad u hesho tilmaamaha Google Maps.
bottomSheet.trafficSurchargeIncluded: Qiimaha waxaa ku jira kharashka gaadiidka

layers.standardDesc: Aragtida caadiga ah ee khariidadaha waddooyinka
layers.iebcOfficesDesc: Dhammaan goobaha xafiisyada IEBC ee dalka Kenya
layers.constituenciesDesc: Xuduudda baarlamaanka iyo doorashada ee dalka Kenya sida uu qeexay IEBC. Qayb kasta waxay mataysaa hal deegaan oo leh koodka iyo magaca uu la yimaado.
layers.healthcareFacilitiesDesc: Qaybinta xarumaha caafimaadka ee dalka (xogta weyn - waxay qaadan kartay daqiiqado dheeraad ah inay soo dejiso)
layers.aboutLayersDesc: Beddel dabaqyada khabiir iyo naafo si aad u habaysato aragtida khariidadahaada. Waxaad isku darsan kartaa dabaqyo xogta kala duwan oo leh khariidado aasaasi ah kala duwan si aad u hesho khibradda ugu fiican.

contribute.title: Ka Qayb Qaad Goobta Xafiiska La Illoobay
contribute.description: Waxaan ka caawinaya inaan sameyno khariidad dhammaan xafiisyada IEBC ee dalka Kenya adigoo ka qayb qaadaya xogta goobta saxda ah.
contribute.googleMapsPlaceholder: Dheji isku xirka Google Maps ama isku-duubyada
contribute.uploadEvidenceDesc: Sawirka xafiiska, calaamadda, ama aagga ku xeeran waxay ka caawinayaan xaqiijinta
contribute.dragDropOrClick: Jiid & dhajiyo ama taabo si aad u soo rarto
contribute.movePin: Jiid sumadda si aad u hagaajiso goobta saxda ah
contribute.submissionSuccessDesc: Kaalintaada waa la gudbiyay waxaana dib loo eegi doonaa maamulayaasha.
contribute.submissionNote: Ogow: Xaqiijinta bulshada waxay ka caawisaa horumarka saxnaanta. Waad ku mahadsan tahay ka-qaybgalka!
contribute.errorInvalidCoordinates: Isku-duubyo aan sax ahayn. Fadlan hubi qiimayaasha loolka iyo dhererka.
contribute.errorSubmissionFailed: Khalad ayaa dhacay gudbinta kaalinta. Fadlan isku day mar kale.
contribute.errorLocationPermission: Ogolaansho goobta waa la diiday. Fadlan khabiir helitaanka goobta.
contribute.errorLocationFailed: Khalad ayaa dhacay helitaanka goobta. Fadlan isku day gelitaanka isku-duubyada gacanta.
contribute.parseError: Qaab aan sax ahayn. Fadlan dheji isku xir sax ah oo Google Maps ah ama isku-duubyada.
contribute.locationRequired: Goobta xafiiska ayaa loo baahan yahay

uber.comfortDesc: Baabuurro cusub oo leh meel dheeraad ah lugaha
